questions.question_text: An organization is using Risk-Based Alerting (RBA). During the past few days, a user account generated multiple risk observations. Splunk refers to this account as what type of entity?

discussion.content: Could someone help me confirm if this is correct

questions.question_text: When searching in Splunk, which of the following SPL commands can be used to run a subsearch across every field in a wildcard field list?
Which of the following is the primary benefit of using the CIM in Splunk?

choices.D: It automatically detects and blocks cyber threats.
choices.B: It improves the performance of search queries on raw data.
choices.A: It allows for easier correlation of data from different sources.
choices.C: It enables the use of advanced machine learning algorithms.

choices.D: Via an Adaptive Response Action in a correlation search.
choices.C: Via an Adaptive Response Action in a regular search.

questions.question_text: How are Notable Events configured in Splunk Enterprise Security?

An analyst is investigating a network alert for suspected lateral movement from one Windows host to another Windows host. According to Splunk CIM documentation, the IP address of the host from which the attacker is moving would be in which field?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
It has to be D because host is for Splunk audit logs. dest, obviously not. src_nt_host is for network sessions (DHCP and VPN traffic), so by getting rid of all the options, must be D.
Im not sure how to respond to that
